TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void RequestPageSetupHandler(object o, RequestPageSetupArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed RequestPageSetupHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the RequestPageSetupHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the RequestPageSetupHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the RequestPageSetupHandler is removed from the event.
